import React, {Component, Fragment} from 'react' import '../assets/css/templatemo-stand-blog.css'; import '../assets/css/custom.css'; import '../assets/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faShareAlt, faTags, faAngleDoubleRight } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import axios from 'axios'; import ApiUrl from '../api/ApiUrl'; import { EMDate,EMExplode } from '../helper/Helper'; class PostDetails extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(); this.state={ slugUrl:props.slug, title:'...', description:'...', image:'', tags:'', cat_name:'', author_name:'', comments:'', publishDate:'', } } componentDidMount(){ const makeUrl = ApiUrl.singlePost+this.state.slugUrl; axios.get(makeUrl).then(response=>{ console.log(response.data) this.setState({ title:response.data[0]['title'], description:response.data[0]['description'], image:response.data[0]['image'], tags:response.data[0]['tags'], cat_name:response.data[0]['cat_name'], author_name:response.data[0]['aut_name'], comments:response.data[0]['comments'], publishDate:response.data[0]['publish_date'], }) }).catch(error=>{ this.setState({ title:'...', description:'...', image:'', tags:'', cat_name:'', author_name:'', comments:'', publishDate:'', }) }); } render(){ return(
{this.state.cat_name}

{this.state.title}

  • {this.state.author_name}
  • May 12, 2020
  • {this.state.comments} Comments

{this.state.description}

  • Best Templates,
  • TemplateMo
  • Facebook,
  • Twitter

) } } export default PostDetails;
